title: Stock Market Prediction Dashboard
description: A real-time stock market prediction system using LSTM neural networks and technical indicators. Features interactive visualizations and automated trading signals.
fullDescription:
Built an end-to-end stock market prediction system using deep learning techniques.

Key Features:
• LSTM neural network for time series prediction
• Real-time data fetching using yfinance API
• Technical indicators (RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands)
• Interactive Streamlit dashboard with candlestick charts
• Backtesting framework for strategy validation

Achieved 85% directional accuracy on S&P 500 predictions with automated buy/sell signals. The system processes historical data, identifies patterns, and provides actionable insights for traders.
